name: The Glass Queen
description:
The Glass Queen is a top-down ARPG style wave survival game with tower defense elements. Created in 9 days and submitted for the Godot Wild Jam #52.

ONCE, she ruled a thriving dwarven kingdom...

But, when THE STRIFE attacked, they took her kingdom, her husband, and everything that she ever loved.

NOW The Glass Queen must protect what remains of her once prosperous kingdom and fortify THE CHANDELIER, a crystal mausoleum imbued with dwarven spirits, with a network of defensive towers to SURVIVE the night and collect enough ICHOR to defeat her shadowy foe… ONCE AND FOR ALL!

BUILD TOWERS

UPGRADE YOUR DEFENSES

AND HUNT STRIFE SPAWNERS

in this ACTION packed top-down ARPG style wave defense with tower defense elements as...
